name: Jump Locke'd
description:
Hi!

This is a game currently in development for My First Game Jam: Winter 2021!, my first ever game jam! Posting this early version here to get some feedback and to test for bugs (I've had some audio crashing issues)

Changes:

- Added BG

- Stage timer in MSEC + full session timer

- Added stage boundary so player doesn't fall forever

- Switched level 3 & 4 and worked on new levels (not in game yet)

- Fixed variable jump bug

- Added a background song (music by my good friend Breadler)
